name: git-secret-action
description: A GitHub action that reveals git secrets

scripts.release: npx entro-version release --master-branch-name=main --during-release-post-hook="npm run templates:update && git commit -am 'Updated the templates'"
scripts.release:major: npx entro-version release --master-branch-name=main --commit-and-tag-version-flag="--release-as=major" --during-release-post-hook="npm run templates:update && git commit -am 'Updated the templates'"

author: Kerren-Entrostat
